Question: This person was born Margaret Hilda Roberts in Grantham, Lincolnshire, on 13 October 1925.
Hints: This person became a Privy Councillor (PC) upon becoming Secretary of State for Education and Science in 1970.
Some Heathite Conservatives in the Cabinet, the so-called "wets", expressed doubt over this person's policies.
This person was not a candidate in the 1955 general election as it came fairly soon after the birth of her children.
